name: ProTexting
overview:
Based in New York City, and founded by CEO Kalin Kassabov and CTO Petar Kassov, ProTexting offers a comprehensive suite of interactive mobile marketing tool designed to make it easy to create, deliver and monitor all types of mobile campaigns. ProTexting helps businesses reach their customers on their mobile phones so they can achieve direct communication and increase sales. Beyond the ability to send text messages to groups, users can deliver: mobile coupons, mobile surveys and voting, mobile sweepstakes, mobile virtual business cards, QR codes and more.

ProTexting Mission Statement

Mobile Empowerment for every Brand and Agency of any size. Bridge the gap between offline and online worlds. Provide people with timely and relevant information through mobile interaction and engagement on any mobile phone.

ProTexting Evolution: From Back-End Solutions To A Sophisticated Platform

ProTexting originated from within a team of mass text messaging experts. Their team has been in the mass text messaging and Mobile Marketing business for over seven years. Throughout the years they have been involved in many projects, from simple SMS campaign implementations to custom designed Mobile Marketing platforms. During their interaction with clients of all sizes one question repeats almost every time – how can an organization implement a Mobile Marketing initiative quickly and without the large upfront expense and complex setup.

video_embeds.description: What is ProTexting? ProTexting.com offers suite of highly interactive mobile marketing tools, giving you the ability to communicate and market to your clients via text message interactions.
Mobile Audience Engagement on Stage via Texting - ProTexting with Wali Collins - The “Bar” Episode
